name: The Other Other Spaceship Game!
description: Welcome to The Other Other Spaceship Game! It's.....another game about spaceships shooting at each other. Regardless, the game includes different ships with different stats. It also contains free cosmetics that make you look cool like me! Plus, the OST is pretty good and will be on streaming platforms on the 25th of August! So what are you waiting for? Install space inva-...I mean The Other Other Spaceship Game! today!
